title: Bellator 232: Make your predictions for Rory MacDonald vs. Douglas Lima
text:
We want your predictions for Saturday’s Bellator 232 event in Uncasville, Conn.

Our staff picks feature includes the consensus picks from MMA Junkie readers. Simply cast your vote for each bout below, and we’ll use the official tallies that are registered by Thursday at noon ET (9 a.m. PT).

Those MMA Junkie reader consensus picks will be part of the Bellator 232 event staff predictions we release Friday ahead of the event. Bellator 232 takes place Saturday at Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Conn. The main card streams on DAZN following prelims on MMA Junkie.

Make your picks for all six main-card fights inside:
description: We want your predictions for Saturday's Bellator 232 event in Uncasville, Conn.
